# Library
```{r}
library("zoo")
library("dplyr")
```

# Import Data

```{r}
finalSdf <- read.csv("export2.csv")

is.atomic(finalSdf)
```

# Aggregate Quarterly 

```{r}

finalSdf$DATEymd <- as.Date(finalSdf$DATEymd, "%Y-%m-%d")

subset <- finalSdf %>%
  filter(DATEymd >= "1996-01-01")

ts.subset <- ts(subset, start = c(1996, 1), frequency = 12)
q.df <- as.data.frame(aggregate(ts.subset, nfrequency = 4))
q.df$X <- seq.int(nrow(q.df))




```

# Adjust sums to averages

```{r}

q.df$prop.fem <- q.df$Freq.Female / q.df$Count.Report

q.df$prop.priv <- ( q.df$Freq.Private.College.University + q.df$Freq.Private.College.University..Inactive.Code + q.df$Freq.Private.Elem.Secondary.School + q.df$Freq.Private.Employer + q.df$Freq.Private.Employment.Agency ) / q.df$Count.Report


```

# Create Time Series

```{r}
q.tsdf <- ts(q.df, start = c(1996, 1), frequency = 4)
```
